participant_1.name: Ava
participant_1.personality: Creative, reflective, and a bit anxious but passionate about her interests.
participant_1.background: I usually wear comfortable clothes when I visit India because I am there to relax. I'm not a big exerciser because I get anxious when I push myself too hard. I enjoy making 3D models for video games and animations. I enjoy movies that are full of suspense and mystery. I recently had knee surgery.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Energetic, nurturing, and has a great sense of humor.
participant_2.background: I am not the fittest person, but I run to stay healthy for my baby. I am a soccer mom. I love art. I have a laptop that allows me to easily share my travel pictures and stories with others. My adoptive parents were amazed when I played twinkle twinkle little star with my armpit.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I'm doing great! Just got back from India. It was so relaxing!
That's great! I've always wanted to go to India. I'm really glad you had a good time.
Thanks! I did a lot of shopping while I was there. I got some really comfortable clothes.
That's awesome! I love shopping! What kind of clothes did you get?
I got a lot of saris and some other traditional Indian clothing. I also got some comfortable shoes.
Oh, that sounds great! I've always wanted to try wearing a sari.
You should! They're really comfortable and they look amazing.
Maybe I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! So, what do you do for fun?
I'm a soccer mom, so I spend a lot of time running around with my kids. I also love to paint and draw.
That's awesome! I love to paint and draw too. I'm not very good at it, but it's fun.
That's great! I'm sure you're better than you think.
Thanks! I'm not sure about that, but I'm having fun with it.
